targets.expr:
max by(pod, workload_type, workload, uid, node) (
  # kube-state-metrics sometimes prints different image_spec for the same container ID,
  # which causes errors with duplicate entries.
  # This is probably related to using AdvancedDaemonSet from OpenKruise
  max without(image_spec) (label_replace((
    last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container_id!=""}[$__range])
    or
    last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container_id!=""}[$__range])
  ), "name", "$1", "container_id", "containerd://(.*)"))
  * on(cluster, namespace, pod, name) group_right(uid)
  max without(uid) (last_over_time(container_last_seen_time{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
) * 1000 * on(pod, uid) group_left(workload_type, workload)
max by(pod, workload_type, workload, uid) (
  last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid!=""}[$__range])
)

round((
time() -
max by(pod, uid) (
  # kube-state-metrics sometimes prints different image_spec for the same container ID,
  # which causes errors with duplicate entries.
  # This is probably related to using AdvancedDaemonSet from OpenKruise
  max without(image_spec) (label_replace((
    last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container_id!=""}[$__range])
    or
    last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container_id!=""}[$__range])
  ), "name", "$1", "container_id", "containerd://(.*)"))
  * on(cluster, namespace, pod, name) group_right(uid)
  last_over_time(container_last_seen_time{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])
  or
  last_over_time(kube_pod_created{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range])
)
))

max by(pod, uid, host_network, pod_ip) (
topk by(pod, uid) (1, count_over_time(kube_pod_info{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", pod_ip!=""}[$__range])) * 0
)
+ on(pod, uid) group_left()
max by(pod, uid) (
  last_over_time(kube_pod_created{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range])
) * 1000

min by(pod) (
    (kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Failed"} == 1) * 2
    or
    (kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Pending"} == 1) * 3
    or
    (
        kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Running"} == 1
        and on(cluster_type, cluster, namespace, pod)
        min_over_time(kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", condition="true"}[$__interval]) == 1
    ) * 4
    or
    (
        kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Running"} == 1
        and on(cluster_type, cluster, namespace, pod)
        min_over_time(kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", condition="true"}[$__interval]) == 0
    ) * 5
    or
    (kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Succeeded"} == 1) * 6
    or
    (kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Unknown"} == 1) * 7
)
sum by (pod) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name", invalid=$total}[$__rate_interval]))
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", type="hard", resource="requests.cpu"}))
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", type="hard", resource="limits.cpu"}))

sum by(pod) (
  max by(pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name"}[$__rate_interval]))
  /
  max by(pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", resource="cpu"})
)

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", resource="memory"}[$__interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", resource="memory"}[$__interval])))
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", type="hard", resource="requests.memory"}))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", resource="memory"}[$__interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", resource="memory"}[$__interval])))
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", type="hard", resource="limits.memory"}))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name"}[$__rate_interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name", invalid=$total}[$__rate_interval])))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name"}[$__rate_interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name", invalid=$total}[$__rate_interval])))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name"}[$__rate_interval])) / max by (pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory"}))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name"}[$__rate_interval])) / max by (pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", resource="memory"}))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name"}[$__rate_interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name", invalid=$total}[$__rate_interval])))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_max_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name"}[$__rate_interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_max_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name", invalid=$total}[$__rate_interval])))

# if we try to use container ID, like with other graphs, query will fail because network statistics have pod sandbox ID
# we can't correlate sandbox ID with pod UID, so there is nothing we can do here
sum by(pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$total}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$total}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

options.content:
Read/write from NFS and SMB shares
will not be shown in the storage throughput.

Cadvisor exports data from cgroup io.stats,
which are only calculated for block devices.

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$container_name"}[$__rate_interval]))
max by(pod) (kube_summary_pod_ephemeral_storage_used_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"})
sum(kube_summary_pod_ephemeral_storage_used_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$total})

max by(pod) (kube_summary_pod_ephemeral_storage_used_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"})
-
sum by(pod) (kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"})

sum(kube_summary_pod_ephemeral_storage_used_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$total})
-
sum(kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$total})
sum by(pod) (kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"})
sum(kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$total})
sum by(pod) (kube_summary_container_rootfs_used_bytes{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"})
sum(kube_summary_container_rootfs_used_bytes{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$total})

panels.description: Absolute values will change based on time scale, because it's showing total increase over an interval.

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (rate(kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / 1000
sum(rate(kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$total}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / 1000

panels.title: logs written

targets.expr: max by(pod) (ephemeral_storage_container_volume_usage{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})
sum(ephemeral_storage_container_volume_usage{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", invalid=$total})

list.definition: query_result(group by(pod) (last_over_time(        namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace",workload=~"$workload", pod=~".*($pod_filter).*"}[$__range]      )    * on (cluster, namespace, pod, uid) group_left ()      max by (cluster, namespace, pod, uid) (        last_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])      )  * on (cluster, namespace, pod, uid) group_left (node)    max by (cluster, namespace, pod, uid, node) (      last_over_time(kube_pod_info{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace",node=~"$node_selector"}[$__range])    )))
list.label: pod
list.name: pod

query.query: query_result(group by(pod) (last_over_time(        namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace",workload=~"$workload", pod=~".*($pod_filter).*"}[$__range]      )    * on (cluster, namespace, pod, uid) group_left ()      max by (cluster, namespace, pod, uid) (        last_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])      )  * on (cluster, namespace, pod, uid) group_left (node)    max by (cluster, namespace, pod, uid, node) (      last_over_time(kube_pod_info{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace",node=~"$node_selector"}[$__range])    )))

list.description: this hidden variable is used to convert selected UID to container_ID, because cadvisor metrics don't have [reliable] UID on them
list.name: container_name
